article_title: UN General Assembly demands Israel ends occupation of Palestinian territories
sentence: It  comes  after  almost  a  year  of  war  in  Gaza,  which  began  when  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  as  hostages.

article_title: UN General Assembly demands Israel ends occupation of Palestinian territories
sentence: More  than  41,110  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: UN General Assembly demands Israel ends occupation of Palestinian territories
sentence: There  has  also  been  a  spike  in  violence  in  the  West  Bank  over  the  same  period,  in  which  the  UN  says  more  than  680  Palestinians  and  22  Israelis  have  been  killed.

article_title: UN General Assembly demands Israel ends occupation of Palestinian territories
sentence: Another  10  Israelis  have  been  killed  in  attacks  by  Palestinians  in  Israel.
